content.rendered:
Dental Crowns

Dental Crowns Gardena, CA

A dental crown can be the best option if you are dealing with a painful and damaged tooth. A tooth that has suffered substantial decay can be supported by a dental crown, also known as a cap. A custom fitted crown covers your entire tooth, beginning at the gum line, and restores your tooth to its natural size and shape.

What is a Dental Crown Used For?

Porcelain crowns can be an excellent, natural-looking alternative if you need to safeguard a weak tooth or replace a worn-out metal treatment. Dental crowns are routinely used for:

  • Keeping adjacent teeth healthy
  • Aligning bite pressure
  • Halting bone loss
  • Maintaining bone structure
  • Speech improvement
  • Natural tooth functionality

What Are Dental Crowns Made of?

Gold, porcelain, or porcelain bonded to metal can all be used to make dental crowns. Because they mimic the natural color and appearance of your teeth, porcelain crowns are widely used. These dental crowns improve your smile while also offering superior strength and functionality.

Book Your Appointment Now
